thread.title: democratic debate 2015: Donald Trump tweets the Dem debate
thread.title_full: democratic debate 2015: Donald Trump tweets the Dem debate - POLITICO

author: Susan B. Glasser
title: democratic debate 2015: Donald Trump tweets the Dem debate
text:
Because Donald Trump is not part of the Democratic debate on Tuesday night, he's predicting that "people are going to turn it on for a couple of minutes and then fall asleep." In an effort to make the debate more exciting, Trump has generously decided to live-tweet it from afar. Below are his most memorable tweets of the night. Can anyone imagine Chafee as president? No way.
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 14, 2015
The trade deal is a disaster, she was always for it! #DemDebate
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 14, 2015
Get rid of all of these commercials. #DemDebate
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 14, 2015
Putin is not feeling too nervous or scared. #DemDebate
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 14, 2015
We will all have fun and hopefully learn something tonight. I will shoot straight and call it as I see it, both the good and the bad. Enjoy!
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 14, 2015
Should be interesting but too bad the three guys at《1% will be taking up so much time - but who knows, maybe a star will be born (unlikely)
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 14, 2015
